definition[0]: not likely to be true or correct
example[1]: It is questionable whether the taxpayer receives value for money.
definition[1]: not likely to be good, honest, or useful
example[2]: I suspected that his motives for helping us were questionable.
example[3]: He was a man of questionable character.
example[4]: Looking back, we did make some questionable decisions.
definition[3]: behaviour or actions that are questionable seem likely to be dishonest or wrong
example[5]: business deals of a rather questionable kind
